the_warlord:Rebuff.NAME: Rebuff
the_warlord:Rebuff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Gain !M! the_warlord:Reaction Time.

the_warlord:HighReward.NAME: High Reward
the_warlord:HighReward.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

the_warlord:Syrette.NAME: Syrette
the_warlord:Syrette.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

the_warlord:NeckSlash.NAME: Neck Slash
the_warlord:NeckSlash.DESCRIPTION: Apply the_warlord:Gush and !M! the_warlord:Bleed to a random enemy.

the_warlord:WideSwipes.NAME: Wide Swipes
the_warlord:WideSwipes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

the_warlord:MeFirst.NAME: Me First
the_warlord:MeFirst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage if enemy is attacking.

the_warlord:SuperSaver.NAME: Super Saver
the_warlord:SuperSaver.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost.
the_warlord:SuperSaver.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain [E] equal to its cost + 1.

the_warlord:FinishOff.NAME: Finish Off
the_warlord:FinishOff.DESCRIPTION: Your attacks deal double damage this turn. NL the_warlord:Purge.
the_warlord:FinishOff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your attacks deal double damage this turn. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL the_warlord:Purge.

the_warlord:ZigZag.NAME: Zig Zag
the_warlord:ZigZag.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block for each enemy in combat.

the_warlord:Fracture.NAME: Fracture
the_warlord:Fracture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If enemy has block, this deals double damage.

the_warlord:Phalanx.NAME: Phalanx
the_warlord:Phalanx.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block X times. NL Gain X Thorns. NL Exhaust.

the_warlord:Wrap.NAME: Wrap
the_warlord:Wrap.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.

the_warlord:HitNRun.NAME: Hit 'n Run
the_warlord:HitNRun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain !B! block.

the_warlord:StunNeedle.NAME: Stun Needle
the_warlord:StunNeedle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

the_warlord:Headlong.NAME: Headlong
the_warlord:Headlong.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Draw !the_warlord:UrMagic! fewer card next turn.

the_warlord:SupportingFire.NAME: Supporting Fire
the_warlord:SupportingFire.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL This damage is increased by your the_warlord:Reaction Time.

the_warlord:Scout.NAME: Scout
the_warlord:Scout.DESCRIPTION: If this is the first card played this turn, draw !M! cards.

the_warlord:TopsyTurvy.NAME: Topsy-Turvy
the_warlord:TopsyTurvy.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Randomize their cost this turn.

the_warlord:BloodMagic.NAME: BloodMagic
the_warlord:BloodMagic.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! Bleed to a random enemy.

the_warlord:Steamroll.NAME: Steamroll
the_warlord:Steamroll.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. NL Exhaust.

the_warlord:Furrow.NAME: Furrow
the_warlord:Furrow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this card's Block by !M! this combat.

the_warlord:Fortress.NAME: Fortress
the_warlord:Fortress.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose HP. NL the_warlord:Purge.
the_warlord:Fortress.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next !M! times you would lose HP. NL the_warlord:Purge.

the_warlord:BuildingFortress.NAME: Building Fortress
the_warlord:BuildingFortress.DESCRIPTION: Add Fortress to your the_warlord:Parry Deck.
the_warlord:BuildingFortress.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded Fortress to your the_warlord:Parry Deck.

the_warlord:Zweihänder.NAME: Zweihänder
the_warlord:Zweihänder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose all the_warlord:Reaction Time.

the_warlord:ThousandBlades.NAME: Thousand Blades
the_warlord:ThousandBlades.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! the_warlord:Gush to ALL enemies.

the_warlord:Ablution.NAME: Ablution
the_warlord:Ablution.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of your debuffs. NL Purge.

the_warlord:HighStakes.NAME: High Stakes
the_warlord:HighStakes.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards then draw that many. NL the_warlord:Purge.
the_warlord:HighStakes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards then draw that many.

the_warlord:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
the_warlord:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: If this is the first card played this turn, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

the_warlord:Assess.NAME: Assess
the_warlord:Assess.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to half enemy's attack intent. NL Exhaust.
the_warlord:Assess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain Block equal to half enemy's attack intent. NL Exhaust.

the_warlord:PerfectAnswer.NAME: Perfect Answer
the_warlord:PerfectAnswer.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to ALL incoming attack damage. NL Exhaust.

the_warlord:SwordDance.NAME: Sword Dance
the_warlord:SwordDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card played this turn.

the_warlord:Diversion.NAME: Diversion
the_warlord:Diversion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !M! Block.

the_warlord:Anticipation.NAME: Anticipation
the_warlord:Anticipation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, put !M! card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Draw !M! fewer card each turn.

the_warlord:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
the_warlord:Riposte.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you the_warlord:Parry, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

the_warlord:Punishment.NAME: Punishment
the_warlord:Punishment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have the_warlord:Parried this turn, play this card an additional time.

the_warlord:Stimulation.NAME: Stimulation
the_warlord:Stimulation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Syrette into your hand.
the_warlord:Stimulation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a Syrette into your hand.

the_warlord:BoilingBlood.NAME: Boiling Blood
the_warlord:BoilingBlood.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! the_warlord:Gush to a random enemy.

the_warlord:DeftCharge.NAME: Deft Charge
the_warlord:DeftCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have the_warlord:Reaction Time, draw !M! cards.

the_warlord:DecisiveFactor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

the_warlord:TakeShelter.NAME: Take Shelter
the_warlord:TakeShelter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, add a Syrette to your hand.
the_warlord:TakeShelter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next !M! turns, add a Syrette to your hand.

the_warlord:Firecracker.NAME: Firecracker
the_warlord:Firecracker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

the_warlord:Somersault.NAME: Somersault
the_warlord:Somersault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

the_warlord:Prey.NAME: Prey

the_warlord:Backsword.NAME: Backsword

the_warlord:HeadStart.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !the_warlord:UrMagic! the_warlord:Reaction Time.

the_warlord:DeadlyMist.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! the_warlord:Gush and !the_warlord:UrMagic! the_warlord:Bleed to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

the_warlord:BoobyTrap.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

the_warlord:DoubleTeam.NAME: Double Team

the_warlord:DoubleTeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next card this turn is played twice.

the_warlord:TripleSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play this card !M! more times.

the_warlord:CompositeArmor.NAME: Composite Armor
the_warlord:CompositeArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Plated Armor.
